targets.expr:
# sum(rpc_submitted_total{chain=~"$chain"}) - sum(rpc_completed_total{chain=~"$chain"})
# sum by (chain) (increase(rpc_submitted_total{chain=~"$chain"}[$__range])) - 
# sum by (chain) (increase(rpc_completed_total{chain=~"$chain"}[$__range]))

sum by (chain) (increase(rpc_submitted_total{chain=~"$chain"}[$__range]) - increase(rpc_completed_total{chain=~"$chain"}[$__range]))
